org.peertrust.protege.plugin
Class PolicyClassTreeView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.peertrust.protege.plugin.PolicyClassTreeView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PolicyClassTreeView
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class is used to show the class with there policies. The classes are shown in a tree; with the selected class as root and it parents as "child". The class policies are shown in a table.

Date: 30-Oct-2004
Last changed: $Date: 2006/09/20 15:25:14 $ by $Author: jldecoi $

Author:
Patrice Congo
